entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY ENDED, Grand Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:49 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.7°C

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
